key.name: audio-devices
key.description: JSON list of objects with fields: id, name, deviceType, cycled, active. Of those attributes, id and active are not actually permanent, but initialized every time the extension is enabled. Furthermore, devices with cycled = false, active = false are removed on startup, so as not to keep old devices that will probably never be used again.
